import { useState } from 'react' const AddTask = (addTaskExecuted) => { const [text, setText] = useState(''); const [day, setDay] = useState(''); const [reminder, setReminder] = useState(false); return (
setText(e.target.value)} />
setDay(e.target.value)} />
setReminder(e.target.checked)} />
